participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Caring and reflective, Jason often finds joy in his family life but struggles with self-doubt.
participant_1.background: I love to spend time with my kids and show them my collection. I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best. I don't believe in love. She taught me to cook. My favorite musician is Bruno Mars.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nostalgic, Emily enjoys the company of her pets and values meaningful conversations.
participant_2.background: I like music that reminds me of my family and friends. I miss my dog, but I have a new friend in my cat. I will go to Comic Con if I can wear my favorite hoodie. I try to stay active and keep my mind busy to avoid feeling anxious. I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars.

content.text: Hey I'm doing pretty good! Just got back from Comic Con
Oh that sounds really fun! did you dress up as anything?
No I didn't, I just wanted to enjoy the panels and the vendors.
Well I'm glad you enjoyed it. I've never been to one before but I've heard they're a lot of fun
They really are! You should definitely go to one if you get the chance
I will! I love the movies and the tv shows so I'm sure I'd have a great time
Yeah you definitely would! What are some of your favorite tv shows or movies?
I love Star Wars and Harry Potter. I also really like the Marvel movies
Oh nice! Me too! I love Star Wars and Harry Potter. I'm not a huge fan of the Marvel movies but I do like some of them
It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do
Yeah it is! I'm glad we met
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon
